name: The Endless Assault
description:
The Endless Assault is an action tower defense with free form tower placement. This project has takes inspiration from games like the dungeon defender series and orcs must die.

In this built there are 3 maps: Blackridge Gates, The Lost Crypt, and the Dark Temple. Each map is set to have its own style and feel. Each map has their respected bosses and monstered that will be spawned throughout the game.

Players are able to set up lobbies, either public or private, for groups up to 4 players. Each player will be able to place their defenses they have selected and deduct from the groups defense funds. After each wave the funds will be added to give the players the ability to place more defenses.

The defenses the players have selected are set to a simple default that is useful for newer player but are able to be changed out from the defense window on the title screen. Currently there are a limited number of defenses and types. There is 1 blockade type, 3 tower types, 2 aura types, and 1 trap type. To change out defenses click the defense you want to trade out at the bottom then click the defense from the top that you want to add to your deck.

Towers are defenses that are week on health but are able to do damage. Blockades are wall that are used to blocked off and route monsters. Auras are AOE defenses that take damage when they use their affects on any number of monsters. Traps are small AOE defenses that need to be triggered to do their effects.

There is not a key binds window yet so here are the controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left click - Attack

1-4 - Select Defenses

5 - Deselect Defense

Left click - Place Selected Defense

Scroll wheel - Rotate Selected Defense

Mouse - Rotate Camera
